name: Uncle Drew
description: An anti-ageist comedy about a man's dream to win the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem.

review.author: mildredwalters
review.heading: Laugh Out Loud Funny
review.reviewBody: A senior citizen, I went to this movie with my 29 year-old daughter and 13 year-old granddaughter. We all had our laugh out loud moments during the movie.It's fun and appealing. I can't think of anything not to like. Even the despicable characters were so extreme you had to like them. If you go to the movie for the fun of it-not to critique-you will enjoy.

keywords: based on commercial,basketball,singing in a car,rapping in a car,product placement
